A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The fact that the movie is divisive is proof enough that the movie is bad. At least the majority agree that the prequels is bad with a few good moments. At least the majority thinks TFA is good but safe. This movie is playing by its own rules and not by its predecessors. Saying let go of the past but using the past as a crutch to sell this movie. The theme of the movie is about failure and the movie itself is a failure.
